title: 90/21/ECSC, EEC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 5 January 1990 adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 December 1989 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in non-member countries
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 January 1990
adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 December 1989 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in non-member countries
(90/21/ECSC, EEC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
With effect from 1 December 1989 the weightings applicable to the remuneration of officials serving in non-member countries payable in the currency of their country of employment are adjusted as shown in the Annex.
The exchange rates for the payment of such remuneration shall be those used for implementation of the budget of the European Communities during the month preceding the date on which this Decision takes effect.
attachments:

For the Commission
